content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 32, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 26, "index": 35}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 20, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft dark_prismarine_slab, I need to place 3 dark_prismarine in a row in the crafting grid. I will first move the dark_prismarine from slot 11 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 32, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 26, "index": 35}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 20, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: I have already moved 1 dark_prismarine to slot 1, so I will move the next dark_prismarine to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 32, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 26, "index": 35}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 20, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: I have already moved 2 dark_prismarine to slot 1 and 2, so I will move the next dark_prismarine to slot 3, which is to the right of slot 2.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_prismarine_slab
inventory=[{"type": "dark_prismarine_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 33, "index": 24}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 32, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 26, "index": 35}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 20, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have placed 3 dark_prismarine in a row in the crafting grid, I can craft dark_prismarine_slab by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
